Package mystars.entities

Class Index

  • java.lang.Object
    • mystars.entities.Entity
      • mystars.entities.Index
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Index
extends Entity
    This index class manages creation of lessons within an index and the relationship between student and index. It inherits from the Entity Class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Index.Event
      The events which can be observed on this class.
      static interface  Index.IndexCallback
      Callback function to be executed when an event happens.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Index

        public Index​(Course course,
             int indexNo,
             int maxEnrolled)
      throws AppException
        Constructor for Index. This class is responsible for the creation of an index object.
        Parameters:
        course - The course the Index belongs to.
        indexNo - The index number of the Index.
        maxEnrolled - The maximum enrollment size assigned to the Index.
        Throws:
        AppException - If the indexNo already existed.

      • createLesson

        public void createLesson​(LessonType type,
                         Day day,
                         java.lang.String location,
                         java.lang.String groupNo,
                         boolean[] week,
                         int startPeriod,
                         int endPeriod)
                  throws AppException
        Creates a new lesson with the given information.
        Parameters:
        type - The new Lesons's type.
        day - The day the lesson is conducted.
        location - The location the new lesson will be conducted at.
        groupNo - The group number assigned to the particular lesson.
        week - Array of booleans indicating whether this lesson is held on the particular week
        startPeriod - The period the lessons commences.
        endPeriod - The period the lessons concludes.
        Throws:
        AppException - if invalid parameters are passed to the constructor of Lesson

      • addStudent

        protected boolean addStudent​(Student student)
                      throws AppException
        Add student to this index
        Parameters:
        student - The student to be added into this index.
        Returns:
        true If the student was successfully registered, or false If the student was placed on the waitlist.
        Throws:
        AppException - If student is already enrolled in the index.

                             boolean allocateWaitlist)
        Remove student from this index.
        Parameters:
        student - The student to be removed from this index.
        allocateWaitlist - If true, move one student from the waitlist to the enrolled list
